record.text: In spite of everything 2025 was a pretty fulfilling year for me, games wise. I wrote a lot of BREAK!! stuff (Please check out the blog/START coming soon) and got to connect with other creators as well as members of our community. I'm really looking forward to building off these foundations in 2026.

images.alt: An assembled group of fantasy adventurers, staring right at you!

record.text: I can't decide if I like big lizard or big chicken basilisk more. I made this after  reading Dungeon Meshi for the first time. I modeled the Basilisk after Dong Tao chicken

record.text:
Here's the most important thing I can say about HIS MAJESTY THE WORM. 

It’s fun. I’ve been playing this game once a week for over 8 years and look forward to every session. It’s got staying power.

I hope you will have fun with it.

If you wanna check it out, you can do so here 👇

record.text:
RINGS OF REMINDER

Here's practice I started in 2024, to balance out my severe insecurities: every time I finish a personal project and it is fully out in the world, I get a ring to wear.

Here are all the projects I've finished, in the last two years:

1/

“So long Space Hunter…”

Character example art for my little #ttrpg project. Brief art break is done now so it’s back to writing.

images.alt: Character art line up for a space bounty hunter game called So Long Space Hunter

record.text:
It's taken me a long time to get here, but I'm finally ready to show off my big #ttrpg project.

I'm working on DOWAGER: THE SACRED & STRANGE, a science-fantasy tactics RPG about hunting internet demons and the absurdity of fantastical adventure in the modern world.

images.alt:
The cover art for DOWAGER: THE SACRED & STRANGE, a Tactical RPG of SEMI-AUTOMATIC SORCERY and PSIONIC TURMOIL across the GOLDEN COSMOS, a dream about an evil machine by ABSENTIA.

The cover depicts a colorful cast of player characters standing before a towering megastructure with a gold-colored starscape beyond. A shadowy woman with a feathered cloak holds a sci-fi-styled halbert, a man with feathery angelic features holds an ornate looking gilded rifle, a tall and pig-like goblin dressed like a ship captain holds a studded club, a short feline character excitedly holds up his hands as green magic courses over him and his weapons, a human woman in a gothic dress conjures a red and violet fireball between her hands. Behind them, with her back turned to the viewer, a cat-eared woman in regal armor drives a sword through her torso, and the wound bleeds chromatic light and electricity.

In the corner are a pair of logos: Absentia’s solo/indie publishing label for SINLAND GAMES, and the Human Made logo by Hinokodo.

record.text:
Hey I'm Izzy. I'm a freelance illustrator on the US east coast specializing in character & creature design

I wanna keep human-made art available at all budgets, and my work starts at 20 USD, so please contact me through my website if you're interested in some art

💀🗡️🌻

www.izzypetersart.com

images.alt:
text reading: "(in a heading font) Commissions. (in a handwritten font) Thanks for considering buying my art!

If you buy art from me, it will look something like this (an arrow points left)

My rates work like this: 
characters 20-80
full scenes and covers 100-200
spot art 50-100
...all depending on complexity!

I’ll be happy to tell you upfront what the cost will be - no guessing, no upcharges. Is it too much? ask me how I can simplify it! I’ll be happy to!

There are samples and contact info on my website: izzypetersart.com"
a blue-haired warlock in a crop top and sleeves is sitting, holding an ankle. she has a gold belt and armbands, and her blue silks are adorned with black tentacles

record.text: Quick gush about BREAK!! rpg's sidebar system. It adds to the vibe of the game because it makes me feel a little like I'm going through video game submenus, but also they just make the book so easy to flip though. Can't want to start my campaign in a few weeks.

record.text: A ttrpg about elderly nosferatu?

You're a mischief of rats, cursed with sentience. In deep forgotten places you now follow adventurers around dungeons, biting their heals, stealing their gems, and eating their rations.
#OSR #TinyRPG

Break!! by @greywizard.bsky.social . I haven't got the chance to play this one yet, but it might be the most visually stunning, impressive book I've got. The art is crisp + vibrant. The layout is brilliant. It's even got die rolls on each page so you can flip open at random if you don't have dice.

iapetus arms - WASP

Presenting the IA WASP - the PDW voted "Most Likely to Throw Away Rather than Reload" at the 2256 Independent Munitions awards.
great looking - but it's clunky, outdated, bizarrely designed and way too loud.

Of the patented, reciprocating, finger-pull cocking handle, one customer said;
" I once watched a guy throw a burrito down the barrel of a live AA cannon just to see what noise it'd make. That decision made more sense  to me than this."
